#summary Hello world and other introductory programs.

= Hello World =

The obligatory _Hello world_ program, which prints the string "Hello World" to the console. 
  
{{{
module HelloWorld 
{
  methods 
  {
    Main() 
    {
      Console.WriteLine("Hello World");
    }
  }
}
}}}

In this case we are lazily relying on the fact that the Heron interpreter imports some libraries from .NET. As the standard libraries are developed, a proper IO module will be added.  

= Sieve of Eratosthenes =

This program prints out the prime numbers up to 100. It demonstrates ranges and the select operator.    

{{{
module Sieve
{
  fields 
  {
    max = 10;
  }
  methods 
  {
    Main() 
    {
      var primes = 0..(max * max);
	foreach (i in 2..max)
	  primes = select (j from primes) 
            j % i != 0;		
	foreach (i in primes)
	  Console.WriteLine(i);
    }
  }
}
}}}
